segments.text: Hello , james . Come in . go through to the living room .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hi Kate ... thanks ... wow ! Look at all the furniture . You must spent a fortune on it ! I love your new three-pieces suite .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I told you that I had been saving up money to buy some new furniture and do some redecorating . I finally saved enough and did everything at once .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good for you ! You ’ Ve got new curtains too . That ’ s a very nice shade of blue . This sofa is very comfortable . I could sit on it all day !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you like my carpet ? Be honest ! Tell me what you really think .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: To be honest , it looks like your old carpet . Is it really new or did you just have your old cleaned ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well spotted ! I actually had it cleaned twice , because it was so dirty . The rug is new . You remember my trip to china ? Well , I bought is there .
segments.speaker: S1
